column4: hi, in the past few days i have noticed a decrease on my torrent download speed(previus 1.4Mb/s now 200kb/s), without to change anything, + when downloading with rapidshare everything is ok, any suggestions?
What makes you think the problem is on your end?
If you havent changed anything but there is a change when connecting somewhere else, the problem is likely - somewhere else
it seems very strange, i tried to download the ubuntu.iso and the speed was lame
